name: PR_EST_AP_CLAIM
description: This table stores accounts payable claim context information for managed care estimates.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor associated with the estimate claim detail.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider associated with the estimate claim detail.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service associated with the estimate claim detail.

columns.name: CLAIM_FORMAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The claim format for the estimate claim detail.

columns.name: HISTORY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of historical data used for this estimate claim detail.

columns.name: HX_UB_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The historical UB claim classification to use for this estimate claim detail.
